inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of cirrhosis: Based on liver biopsy or clinical assessment of a hepatologist based on history, exam, laboratory and radiographic evidence
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: History of at least one episode of overt HE, defined by West Haven Criteria Grades II to IV; episodes of HE that were precipitated by gastrointestinal hemorrhage requiring transfusion of at least 2 units of blood, by medication use, by renal failure requiring dialysis, or by injury to the central nervous system will not be counted as previous HE episodes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Compliant with lactulose and rifaximin treatment (lactulose: at least one dose at least 5 days per week; rifaximin: at least one dose at least 5 days per week)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current episode of overt HE as defined by West Haven Criteria Grades II to IV
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Expectation of liver transplantation within two months of the screening visit
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of cirrhosis and previous episodes of overt HE. They are compliant with lactulose and rifaximin treatment.
